title: Teams We Feel Differently About (with Steve Wyche)
itunes:title: Teams We Feel Differently About (with Steve Wyche)
description:
A room filled with some heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Steve Wyche spin through the teams they feel differently about now compared to before the preseason started. Which teams do the heroes like, and which have they soured on? Plus Vic Tafur joins the podcast to discuss Mike Mayock’s recent comments saying the Las Vegas Raiders “need to be a playoff team this year.”

 

Around the NFL is part of the NFL Podcast Network. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
